item.title: MacOS에서 shift-space로 언어변경
item.description: cli로 수정하기 # Write # 스크립트 # # 설정 변경 defaults write com.apple.symbolichotkeys AppleSymbolicHotKeys \ -dict-add 60 " <dict> <key>value</key> <dict> <key>type</key> <string>standard</string> <key>parameters</key> <array> <integer>32</integer> <integer>49</integer> <integer>393216</integer> <!-- from 262144 to 393216 --> </array> </dict> <key>enabled</key> <true/> </dict> " defaults write com.apple.symbolichotkeys AppleSymbolicHotKeys \ -dict-add 61 " <dict> <key>value</key> <dict> <key>type</key> <string>standard</string> <key>parameters</key> <array> <integer>32</integer> <integer>49</integer> <integer>131072</integer> <!--
